attributes.action: Let the head of places of worship decide the number of wedding guests allowed
attributes.additional_details: For places of worship that are adhering to social distancing rules and have the capacity to hold more people to be allowed to decide how many wedding guests a couple can invite.
attributes.background: Not have a universal number of wedding guests as all places of worship have different capacities (even when adhering to social distancing rules). I want the number of guests to be down to the discretion of the head of the particular places of worship.
